body.name: Nightstands Set of 2, Stackable End Table, Side Table, Bedside Tables with Open Storage Shelf, for Bedroom, Living Room, Rustic Brown BF38BZP201
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 16 hrs 23 mins
features: No Compromise on Small Spaces: HOOBRO nightstands can be stackable thanks to the trapezoid-shaped legs. Stacking 2 nightstands together offers a new 2-tier storage shelf for your books, coffee mugs, alarm clocks and other items you want to manage and can maximize the floor space while adding a special attraction to your home decor

Open Storage Compartment: This storage nightstand is designed with an open compartment for your essentials, plants, books or magazines to create a unique decorating style. It will be a qualified steward to organize your daily items upon your reading or sleeping. Additionally, this end table can be stable on uneven ground and friendly to the floor with adjustable feet

Multifunctional Application: Simple yet elegant, this nightstand is versatile because it can perfectly match various decoration styles including retro, modern or industrial. The set of 2 side tables is very practical as the nightstand, shelf, or printer stand and will be the focus in your living room, bedroom, office or any other occasions

Family Helper: It is not only a rechargeable end table, but also can be used as a nightstand, telephone table, etc. Putting it beside the bed, next to the recliner or at the hallway, the modern end table will not be obtrusive in any spot. In short, everything will follow your ideas of bliss and full of fashion comes because of this side table
Easy to Assemble: We have numbered all the accessories and simplified the assembly steps so you just need to follow the comprehensible instructions and complete everything effortlessly and happily
body.description: HOOBRO Nightstand Are you still troubled by the messy room, or still worried that there is no place to put glasses and jewelry before sleeping? This side table with open shelves will be your great assistant to solve the problems. The perfect size enables this nightstand to be built in tight spaces and match sofas and chairs. Therefore, HOOBRO stackable side table can be your life companion for its diversified roles as a coffee stand, writing desk, tea table, snack table, nightstand, couch table etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install, beautiful items and strong

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nightstands - Adequate for the job
reviews.reviewText: These nightstands are fairly small but that was the goal as go in a smaller space allowing for a Queen bed to comfortable fit.Assembly is straight forward.Yes, they will stack if you desire giving a taller / higher nightstand and more open shelving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Guests
reviews.reviewText: Our bed in the guest room sits a little low as it is but this nightstand set fit perfect. Not hard to put together, gives you the Alan key with it. Decent quality (still backer board) but okay quality for the price. Good for a coffee corner or a low traffic area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and easy to build!
reviews.reviewText: When this item first arrived, it was heavy. I assembled both tables within a span of 30 minutes and has all the tools you need. It's amazing and surprisingly sturdy. Though the item looks tiny when set aside a recliner couch so I had to place the item somewhere else but would work best with simple sofas or single seaters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars These are REALLY small
reviews.reviewText: They are really cute and the color is beautiful but they sit about an inch and a half shorter than my matress height. If you want decent height then you have to stack them so get 2 sets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as pictured
reviews.reviewText: These are very cute and functionable. We ordered two for each side of the bed because the bed is high and that was a great call!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rack n Stack
reviews.reviewText: Easy fast assembly was a huge plus and the quality of product!Go “low” go “high”Quicker than you can count to three!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to make it and simple designed for DVD player and DVD discs.
